body.p: An entity makes materiality judgements in preparing both annual financial statements and interim financial reports prepared in accordance with IAS 34 Interim Financial Reporting. In either case, the entity could apply the materiality process described in paragraphs 29–65. For its interim financial report, the entity considers the same materiality factors as in its annual assessment. However, it takes into consideration that the time period and the purpose of an interim financial report differ from those of the annual financial statements.
